reporter_caption.center: S.W. STRAUSS CO. v. STERN, 249 Ill. App. 650 (1928)

caption.center: S.W. Straus Company, complainant and appellee, v. Emanuel Stern and
Joseph Rosenberg, defendants, on appeal of Joseph Rosenberg, appellant.

court.center: Appellate Court of Illinois, Chicago, First District.

opinion.posture:
Bill to impress a trust upon proceeds from sale of bond and for temporary injunction. Injunction issued.
Appeal from interlocutory order of the Circuit Court of Cook county; the Hon. Ira Ryner, Judge, presiding. Heard in the third division of this court for the first district at the April term, 1928.
opinion.attorneys: Sims, Welch, Godman Stransky, for appellant; Elwood G. Godman and Ralph E. Moody, of counsel. Gottlieb, Schwartz Markheim, for appellee; Ulysses S. Schwartz, of counsel.
opinion.opinion_byline: Mr. Presiding Justice Holdom delivered the opinion of the court.
